import React, { useState } from 'react'; //import logo from '../images/logo.svg' import {FaAlignRight} from 'react-icons/fa' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function Navbar(){ const userSignin = useSelector(state => state.userSignin); const { userInfo } = userSignin; const [isOpen, setisOpen] = useState(false); return (

Blomming Gift

  • Cart { userInfo ? {userInfo.name} : Sign In } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && (
    Admin

) }
